verbose_text: In the two cell lines, miR-21 mimic loaded exosomes significantly increased MMP-2 expression compared with hypoxic controls, whereas miR-21 inhibitor loaded exosomes significantly reduced MMP-2 expression compared to cells treated with miR-21 mimic loaded exosomes (P < 0.05; XREF_FIG Visualization and in vivo tracking of the exosomes of murine melanoma B16-BL6 cells in mice after intravenous injection).
